# netbox_export_template (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about an export template in NetBox.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Look up an export template by ID
data "netbox_export_template" "by_id" {
  id = "1"
}

# Example: Look up an export template by name
data "netbox_export_template" "by_name" {
  name = "Device Inventory"
}

# Example: Use export template data in other resources
output "export_template_id" {
  value = data.netbox_export_template.by_id.id
}

output "export_template_name" {
  value = data.netbox_export_template.by_name.name
}

output "export_template_object_types" {
  value = data.netbox_export_template.by_name.object_types
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the export template. Use to look up by ID.
- `name` (String) Name of the export template. Use to look up by name.

### Read-Only

- `as_attachment` (Boolean) Whether to download file as attachment.
- `description` (String) Description of the export template.
- `file_extension` (String) Extension to append to the rendered filename.
- `mime_type` (String) MIME type for the rendered output.
- `object_types` (List of String) List of object types this template applies to.
- `template_code` (String) Jinja2 template code.
